trans-unit.source: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*> method.
trans-unit.target: Especifica quais propriedades devem ser relatadas por descritores de tipo, especificamente o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] oferece suporte a um mecanismo interno que limita o número de propriedades em um tipo que são retornados pelo personalizado <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>descritor de tipo.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: If the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] for encontrado, o descritor de tipo limita o escopo de propriedades retornadas.

trans-unit.source: PropertyFilterAttribute differs from typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata.
trans-unit.target: PropertyFilterAttribute difere do típico [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] porque não é possível aplicá-la a uma classe como metadados.

trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de filtro funciona por meio de código em vez de por meio de metadados estático.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The options that describe this property filter.
trans-unit.target: As opções que descrevem esse filtro de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] é igual ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação compara o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>valores em cada <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>para igualdade de valor.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>é o mesmo, então os dois <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>instâncias são iguais.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado a este <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> é igual à atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the filter options for this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém as opções de filtro para este <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The value of Filter is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed.
trans-unit.target: O valor do filtro é o mesmo valor que foi fornecido para o `filter` argumento do construtor de quando isso <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>foi construído.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: There is no other means of setting the Filter value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum outro meio de definir o valor do filtro.

trans-unit.source: The property filter options.
trans-unit.target: As opções de filtro de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para a atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro de 32 bits com sinal.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a propriedade filtrar opções do atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] corresponde às opções de filtro de propriedade do objeto fornecido.

trans-unit.source: For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a Match result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result.
trans-unit.target: Para atributos que armazenam sinalizadores, que é verdadeiro para <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, um resultado de correspondência pode ser diferente de um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A>resultado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> is a merge of all filter values.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um filtro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>corresponde a um filtro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>, pois <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>é uma mesclagem de todos os valores de filtro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: This object is expected to be a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto deve ser um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a match exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se houver uma correspondência; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
